description.value:
Level 2 Abjuration

Casting Time: 1 action

Range: undefined touch

Components: V, S, M

Duration: 1 hour

You touch another creature that is willing and create a mystic connection between you and the target until the spell ends. While the target is within 60 feet of you, it gains a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws, and it has Resistance|XPHB to all damage. Also, each time it takes damage, you take the same amount of damage. The spell ends if you drop to 0 Hit Points|XPHB or if you and the target become separated by more than 60 feet. It also ends if the spell is cast again on either of the connected creatures.

_srdData.name: Warding Bond

m.text: a pair of platinum rings worth 50+ GP each, which you and the target must wear for the duration
